Breezy Weather (Free network sources-only)

The F-Droid repository for Breezy Weather (Free network sources-only)

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://breezy-weather.github.io/fdroid-repo/fdroid-version/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
34 80 A7 BB 2A 29 6D 8F 98 CB 90 D2 30 91 99 B5 B9 51 9C 1B 31 97 8D BC D8 77 AD B1 02 AF 35 EE
